title: Decisions in academic departments
creator_credit: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Trigger series 7. Managing people”.
Six dramatisations dealing with interpersonal aspects of staff management are designed to trigger discussion. Although set in a university the issues raised are common to all organisations.
creator_credit_for_label: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
